Package sg.dex.starfish

Interface Listing

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AListing, MemoryListing, RemoteListing
    public interface Listing
    Interface representing a listing of an asset on the Ocean Network

    Listings can be used to query and purchase Assets

    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Mike

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Object getAgreement()
      Returns the service agreement associated with this listing.
      Asset getAsset()
      Returns the asset associated with this listing.
      String getAssetID()
      Gets the Asset ID of this listing
      String getId()
      API to get the Listing ID
      Map<String,​Object> getMetaData()
      API to get the meta data of this Listing
      Asset purchase​(Account account)
      Purchases this listing using the given account FIXME: should this return an asset or a purchase?
      Listing refresh()
      Refreshes the Listing data from the agent where it is stored, returning a new listing.

    • Method Detail

      • getAsset

        Asset getAsset()
        Returns the asset associated with this listing.

        The asset may not be available in some circumstances (e.g. lack of access permission) in which case an exception will be thrown.

        Returns:
        The asset for this listing
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if requester does not have access permission
        StorageException - if there is an error in retrieving the Asset

      • getAgreement

        Object getAgreement()
        Returns the service agreement associated with this listing. TODO create service agreement abstraction
        Returns:
        The Agreement associated with this Listing

      • purchase

        Asset purchase​(Account account)
        Purchases this listing using the given account FIXME: should this return an asset or a purchase?
        Parameters:
        account - The account to use for the purchase
        Returns:
        The purchased asset

      • refresh

        Listing refresh()
        Refreshes the Listing data from the agent where it is stored, returning a new listing.
        Returns:
        The latest version of the Listing

      • getMetaData

        Map<String,​Object> getMetaData()
        API to get the meta data of this Listing
        Returns:
        A map of listing metadata

      • getId

        String getId()
        API to get the Listing ID
        Returns:
        Listing ID

      • getAssetID

        String getAssetID()
        Gets the Asset ID of this listing
        Returns:
        The Asset ID
